Package equipments.AirConditioning

Interface AirConditioningUserImplI

All Superinterfaces:
AirConditioningUserAndControlI, AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI
All Known Subinterfaces:
AirConditioningUserCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
AirConditioning, AirConditioningUserConnector, AirConditioningUserInboundPort, AirConditioningUserOutboundPort
public interface AirConditioningUserImplI extends AirConditioningUserAndControlI, AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI
The interface AirConditioningUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the air conditioning: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES

    • setTargetTemperature

      void setTargetTemperature(double target) throws Exception
      set the target temperature.

      Contract

       pre    target >= -50.0 && target <= 50.0
 post   target == getTargetTemperature()
      Parameters:
      target - the new target temperature.
      Throws:
      Exception - to do.
